title: Multiple Calls
code:
§function square(n)
  result ← n ⊗ n
  §transmit result
§end_function

§begin main
  §call square(3)
  §call square(5)
  §call square(7)
§end
solution_description: calls a function multiple times with different arguments to square numbers
hints: The function is called three times
⊗ is being used for multiplication here
